resources.string: "You must accept the Terms and Conditions!"
Your cards have been saved correctly :D
You have already rolled the dice
You can\'t have more cards on the table!
There is no Card on Table
The last time you LoggedIn was at:

Welcome to our Kaiju game!

Authors:
-Paula Silland
-Isaac Brull

Version: Alpha

You can find us on our Pica Projects website:

https://www.pica-projects.com/

Thank you for playing our game, hope you enjoy it!

Before using our application, we invite you to read and accept the following terms and conditions that govern the use of our game:
" "
" "1. Acceptance of the Terms and Conditions:

" "2. Using the Application:

You may not copy, modify, distribute or use our content without our prior written consent.
" "
" "4. Privacy:

We collect and process certain personal data in order to provide you with an optimal gaming experience and to improve our services.
" "
" "5. Responsibility:
" "We are not responsible for any damage, loss or harm derived from the use of our application. We are also not responsible for any interruption in service, technical errors or any other incident that may arise during the use of the application.

Before starting the game, the user will be able to customize their deck and choose 10 of the best cards.\nThere are three types (Nature, Bacterium and Technology), each one has an advantage and disadvantage among the others, as indicated below:\n

The number is the cost of the card and the player can use it according to his luck with the dice.\n- Each card has its damage, if the player decides to attack the opponent\'s cards to eliminate them, they will be the points that will remain
During the game the player must roll the dice first. \n- The values that come out will be added in order to accumulate action points and be able to use the cards\n
Once the dice has been rolled, you can draw up to three cards from the deck.\n

The player will find that there are three states for the cards:
- If they are seen with low opacity, it means that you will not be able to use them during that turn, since the value of the die has to be greater than that of the card
- If the card has a green border, it means that it accumulates enough points to attack
- If the player selects the card to attack, it will turn blue

The player will be able to decide whether to attack the opponent's cards to remove them from his deck, or attack the opponent's life directly.
- Each player starts with 25 of life
- The number under the card represents it's life
Once the player has attacked and can no longer use any more cards, they will have to end the turn
The player who has not run out of cards and/or is still with life will win.\n
